channel.title: (vector3d) MircoT
channel.description: This is my blog, where I will put my experiments and results about how I found a way to solve a problem, hoping to be useful to someone.

item.title: (0, 0, 0) Hello World!
item.description:
This is the start point!

I don’t have something particular to write about, there are a lot of things that waiting to be completed… one step at a time.
